description:
Location.
This Birmingham hotel is adjacent to the International Convention Centre, within one-quarter kilometer of Centenary Square, the Birmingham Central Library, and the Birmingham Repertory Theatre.

Hotel Features.
Copthorne Hotel Birmingham has a restaurant, a bar/lounge, and a coffee shop/café. 24-hour room service is available. This is a smoke-free property (fines may apply for violations).

Guestrooms.
Amenities featured in guestrooms include coffee/tea makers. Guestrooms have satellite television with pay movies. Bathrooms provide hair dryers.

DESCRIPTION.value:
Location.
This Birmingham hotel is adjacent to the International Convention Centre, within one-quarter kilometer of Centenary Square, the Birmingham Central Library, and the Birmingham Repertory Theatre.

Hotel Features.
Copthorne Hotel Birmingham has a restaurant, a bar/lounge, and a coffee shop/café. 24-hour room service is available. This is a smoke-free property (fines may apply for violations).

Guestrooms.
Amenities featured in guestrooms include coffee/tea makers. Guestrooms have satellite television with pay movies. Bathrooms provide hair dryers.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value: Copthorne Hotel Birmingham's guests can enjoy drinks and snacks in the plushly furnished bar. Business guests have access to meeting rooms and business services, and there are complimentary daily newspapers available in the lobby.

DINING.value: Bugis Street Brasserie - Named after the famed area in Singapore, this authentic brasserie features traditional Singaporean, Malay and Chinese cuisine.

RECREATION.value:
There are fitness facilities on site. Guests can find facilities for squash, tennis and ten pin bowling within half a mile of the hotel, while the nearest golf course is three miles away.

The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or near the hotel; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

NEARBY_POINTS_OF_INTEREST.value:
Centenary Square - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Big Brum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Chamberlain Square - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Library of Birmingham - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Adrian Boult Hall - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Victoria Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Birmingham Town Hall - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Birmingham Council House - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
International Convention Centre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Symphony Hall - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Birmingham Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Ikon Gallery - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
National Sea Life Centre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Barclaycard Arena - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The closest major airports to Copthorne Hotel Birmingham are:
Birmingham (BHX) - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi
Coventry (CVT) - 30.9 km / 19.2 mi

The preferred airport for Copthorne Hotel Birmingham is Birmingham (BHX).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Near art gallery
This modern hotel is adjacent to the International Convention Centre and 150 metres from Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery.

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value:
• A resort fee is included in the total price displayed.
  • Children 5 years old and younger stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding.
  • The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Fee for full breakfast: GBP 13.99 per person (approximately)
  • Fee for in-room wireless Internet: GBP 5 per 24-hour period (rates may vary)
  • Fee for wireless Internet in public areas: GBP 5 per 24-hour period (rates may vary)
  • Self parking fee: GBP 12.00 per night
  • Late check-out fee: GBP 30.00
  • Rollaway bed fee: GBP 10 per night
  • Onsite credit card charges are subject to a surcharge

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

MANDATORY_HOTEL_IMPOSED_FEES.value:
You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the hotel:


  • Deposit: GBP 30.00 per night

The charges below are included in your overall room price:

  • Resort fee

We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.

ACCESSIBILITY_OPTION.value: To make requests for specific accessibility needs, complete the "Special or Accessibility Requests" section of "Trip Preferences" when you book your hotel.

TAGLINE.value: 4-star hotel with restaurant, near International Convention Centre

HCOM_KEY_FACTS_AT_CHECK_IN.value:
• Credit card or cash deposit required

  • Government-issued photo ID required

HCOM_TRAVELING_WITH_CHILDREN.value:
• Children (5 years old and younger) stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding

  • No cribs (infant beds)

HCOM_DINING.value: Bugis Street Restaurant - This restaurant specializes in Singaporean cuisine and serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar.

HCOM_FACILITY_POLICIES.value: The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

HCOM_MANDATORY_FEES_IN_BOOKING.value:
The charges below are included in the total price displayed:

  • Resort fee

HCOM_FEES_POLICY.value:
Onsite credit card charges are subject to an extra charge

Late check-out can be arranged for an extra charge of GBP 30.00

HCOM_FEES_INROOM.value: Rollaway beds are available for GBP 10 per night

HCOM_FEES_DINING.value: Full breakfast is offered for an extra charge of GBP 13.99 per person (approximately)

HCOM_FEES_SERVICES.value:
WiFi is available in guestrooms for GBP 5 per 24-hour period (rates may vary)

WiFi is available in public areas for GBP 5 per 24-hour period (rates may vary)

HOTEL_FEATURE.value:
• 212 smoke-free guestrooms
  • Restaurant and bar/lounge
  • Breakfast available
  • WiFi in the lobby
  • Fitness center
  • Self parking
  • Business center
  • 24-hour front desk
  • Daily housekeeping
  • Car rentals on site
  • Computer station
  • Front desk safe
  • Laundry service
  • Conference space
  • Free newspapers in the lobby
  • Luggage storage
  • Porter/bellhop
  • TV in a common area

ROOM_FEATURE.value: Copthorne Hotel Birmingham offers a fantastic location, putting you just a 5-minute walk from International Convention Centre and Big Brum. Guests can visit the fitness center for a workout or grab a bite to eat at Bugis Street Restaurant, which serves Singaporean cuisine and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. This upscale hotel is also within just a 10-minute walk of Victoria Square and Barclaycard Arena.

LOCATION_SECTION.value:
• International Convention Centre (0.2 mi / 0.3 km)
  • Big Brum (0.2 mi / 0.4 km)
  • Victoria Square (0.2 mi / 0.4 km)
  • Barclaycard Arena (0.4 mi / 0.6 km)
  • Birmingham Cathedral (0.4 mi / 0.7 km)

POLICIES.value: Please note: The cost of an extra bed does not include breakfast. For more details, please contact the office using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking.

name: Copthorne Hotel Birmingham
